name: WP Frontend Submit
author: Leo

sections.description:
What this plugin does

WP Frontend Submit(WFS) can let you add a frontend form via shortcode that enables your visitors to submit posts and upload images.
Just add the following shortcode to any Post, Page, or Widget:
‘wp_frontend_submit’

Plugin Homepage:
http://ptheme.com/item/wp-frontend-submit/

WFS uses WordPress native Customize for several basic settings:

  • Allow visitors or only logged users to submit posts
  • Set post status as published immediatelly or require admin’s approval
  • Set the maximium number of images a user can upload for each submission

Support

We will do our best to provide support through the WordPress forums.
However, all plugin support is well provided in our helpdesk. You can register for free here: http://ptheme.com/members/.

Feedback

If you like this plugin, please leave us a good rating and review.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip wp-frontend-submit.zip and upload the entire folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place shortcode [wp_frontend_submit] in your post, page or widget

short_description: Easy to use plugin that enables your visitors and members to submit posts with images from the WordPress frontend.
